vision: Every Iowa Guard kid feels seen, supported, and ready for what's next â€” and leaders can point to stronger, steadier families because of it.
mission: Show up for Guard-connected kids and caregivers with year-round experiences, practical resources, and caring adults so home life stays steady through every drill, mobilization, and return.

strategicInfrastructure.title: Partnership Cultivation
strategicInfrastructure.description: Grow local and statewide partners who help us stretch funding, add fresh experiences, and keep families covered.

strategicInfrastructure.title: Storytelling & Advocacy
strategicInfrastructure.description: Share real Guard family stories so decision-makers understand the wins, the gaps, and why support matters.

strategicInfrastructure.title: Data Collection & Outcome Reporting
strategicInfrastructure.description: Track participation and outcomes so we can show readiness, resilience, and retention gains.

strategicInfrastructure.title: Marketing & Visibility
strategicInfrastructure.description: Keep families and leaders in the loop with clear, consistent updates and event branding.

coreValues.title: Mission Ready
coreValues.description: What we do at camp, in schools, and online directly supports Guard families and the Guard mission.

coreValues.title: Hospitality Hearted
coreValues.description: We welcome every family member like they're walking into our own living room.

coreValues.title: Problem Solvers
coreValues.description: We listen, adapt, and create what families actually need in a fast-changing world.

coreValues.title: Trustworthy
coreValues.description: We steward trust, time, and funding with excellence.
